column4: Help! I upgraded to 8.04 which went wrong towards the end and now I have a system which is painfully slow doing things that worked fine previously - any way of refreshing the op system?
-> do you have a separate /home partition? perhaps a fresh install of 8.04 would be better
-> not all of it, some are in the server side? and not stash in /home
-> you can make copies of your /etc/ and stash it in a dir in /home/  if /home will be preserved
